title: Wordpress users Disclosure [ /wp-json/wp/v2/users/ ]  Not Resolved ()
steps: Observe the list of WordPress users and their information exposed in the response
vuln_description: The WordPress REST API endpoint '/wp-json/wp/v2/users/' is exposed, allowing unauthenticated access to view all WordPress users and their information, including usernames which could be used for brute force attacks.
reason: The vulnerability is straightforward to discover as it only requires accessing a known default WordPress REST API endpoint. No complex interactions or state manipulations are needed.
